MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Princes Drive, Conway Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  08:17AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:23AM on 23rd February 2021
